name: Project Metalstar - GameJam Version
description:
Project Metalstar is a 2.5D Industrial Platformer. Survive the rotating steel arena for a duration of time.

Created for GameDev.TV's Community Game Jam (May 1st to June 1st). 

Team:

Programmer and Game Design: Joshlynn, https://joshlynn.itch.io/

Sound Engineer and Music Composer: Cris "Me0", https://itch.io/profile/cris0me

Sprite Artist: Zak Stam, https://itch.io/profile/zak-stam

3D Modeler and Concept Artist: Jaimal Quezada

Controls:

A/D - Move horizontally and enables Wall Sliding when on a wall.

Space Bar - Jump

F Key - Interact 

ESC Key - Pause Menu
